text: Ivanka Marinova Hristova (; 19 November 1941 â€“ 24 February 2022) was a Bulgarian shot putter. She won the gold medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics, and the bronze in 1972. Khristova died on 24 February 2022, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic medalists for Bulgaria Category:Shot putters Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Olympic gold medalists Category:Medalists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics
